original_title: SLT-MOBITEL continues to drive sustainable initiatives, making a positive impact
original_body_lines: As part of its ongoing efforts to create a positive impact on society and the environment, SLT-MOBITEL has implemented various sustainable Environmental, Social, Governance (ESG) initiatives at Jinaraja Maha Vidyalaya, Gampola recently.

The program consisted of three projects, and SLT-MOBITEL collaborated with several valued partners to create a lasting positive impact on the local community and drive sustainable development for the area. The projects included conducting awareness campaigns for STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) Education, creating student entrepreneurship, a book donation project under ‘Hithak Athnam Pothak Denna’ targeted at promoting a reading culture, and a Tree Planting Project together with Ogilvy Public Relations Sri Lanka.

Participating in the event on behalf of SLT were Anuruddha Ratnayake, General Manager – Regional Operations – R1 and Nilanthi Jayakody, Deputy General Manager – Public Relations, who were also present at the event along with the principal, staff, and students of the school, officials from Ogilvy Public Relations Sri Lanka, members of SLT-MOBITEL Customer Club, Gampola and SLT-MOBITEL officials, and volunteers of the STEMUP foundation.
